data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye kedi gi joma kedo koda;
Kaw kuodi gi okumbani;
Chom tongʼ ma dhoge bith mar kedo
Mad joma dwaro ketho ngimana,
Mad gichal gi mihudhi ma yamo tero,
mad yore ma giluwo bed gi mudho
Nikech gichikona obadhogi kayiem nono
mad kethruok jukgi apoya ka gikia
Eka chunya nobed mamor kuom Jehova Nyasaye
Ringra gi chunya duto, biro hulo kawacho niya,
Joma timo neno ma wengegi tek sudo nyime;
Gichula rach kar ber,
To kane gituo magihewore to ne arwako law ywagruok
ne awuotho koni gi koni ka chunya lit,
To kane achwanyora, negichokore kaachiel gi mor;
Kaka joma ok oluoro Nyasaye chayo ji,
Yaye Ruoth, ibiro siko kirango gigi katimore nyaka karangʼo?
Abiro goyoni erokamano e chokruok maduongʼ;
Kik iyie ni jogo osungre ni gisenyala,
Ok giwuo gi kwe,
Giyawona dhogi maduongʼ kendo nyiera ka giwachona giwacho niya, “Haa! Haa!
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, iseneno timgini; kik ilingʼ.
Aa malo, kendo chungi mondo ikonya!
Yala kichwaka kuom timni makare, yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasacha;
Kik iwe giwach e chunygi niya,
Mad ji duto mamor nikech chandruokna
Mad joma mor kuom loch ma imiya
Abiro pako timni makare
